Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park/Sheridan
ShortDescription: Southbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Irving Park, Marine, and Inner Lake Shore due to, street blockage at Irving Park/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Irving Park, Marine, and Inner Lake Shore due to, street blockage at Irving Park/Sheridan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Jefferson Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Jefferson Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
